title: API Rate Limiting Implementation
author: Your Name
description: Implemented rate limiting for API endpoints to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage across all clients.
changes: Added rate limiting middleware using express-rate-limit
Configured different limits for authenticated vs anonymous users
Implemented Redis-based rate limiting for distributed systems
Added rate limit headers to all API responses
Created monitoring dashboard for rate limit metrics
decisions: Chose express-rate-limit with Redis store because we need distributed rate limiting across multiple server instances. Authenticated users get 1000 requests/hour while anonymous users get 100 requests/hour. We use sliding window algorithm for smoother rate limiting. Headers are included so clients can implement proper retry logic.
diagram:
graph TD

    B -->|Within Limit| C[Process Request]
    B -->|Exceeded| D[Return 429 Too Many Requests]
    C --> E[Increment Counter]
    E --> F[Return Response]
    D --> G[Include Retry-After Header]
